Title: Puff Pastry Pizza
Writer: Josh Thomas, Thomas Ward (additional writing), Erik Jensen (additional writing)
Actors: Josh Thomas, Keegan Joyce, Caitlin Stasey, Thomas Ward
Plot: Tom creates a pinata filled with secrets that he, Josh, and Clare take turns reading. With Arnold away, Josh decides to explore the benefits of an open relationship by inviting a man named Ben, leading to a night of revelations.
